ussr.model
Class Module

java.lang.Object
  ussr.model.Entity
      ussr.model.Module

public class Module
extends Entity

A module is the basic unit from which the modular robot is built. Specifically, each module is associated with a controller, and is thus the unit of autonomous behavior. This class represents an abstraction of a module that is physics engine independent.

Author:
ups

setController

public void setController(Controller controller)
Set the controller of the module. The module of the controller will in turn be set to this module by calling setModule on the controller.

Parameters:
controller - the controller to associate with this module

eventNotify

public void eventNotify()
Notify the controller (or anything else waiting for an event on this module) that some external event has occurred which can be observed by the module.
